description: Hayden Richards"The Swank"Ht: 6'0" WT: 180lbs Season W/L record ( 3-0)Jace Chambers"The Juggernaut"Ht: 6'1" WT: 195lbsSeason W/L record (0-0) Undefeated Hayden "The Swank" Richards returns to the mat after defeating Troy "The Tank" Sparks. Challenging The Swank is newcomer Jace "The Juggernaut" Chambers. Jace isn't intimidated by the Swank's record, he thinks he's just a cocky bastard who needs to be knocked down a few pegs. The Swank sees things much different though, he plans on giving Jace's ass the ground 'n pound in the sex round after he's done ground 'n pounding him on the mat. It's an all out brawl as these two big-dicked studs go head to head in the battle of skill versus size. Only one can come out victorious, leaving the loser fucked, dominated, and covered in cum.
title: Hayden "The Swank" Richards vs Jace "The Juggernaut" Chambers
